overview: On May 24, 1990, Eric Bonavita, 33, died of a heroin overdose in Paris. Living his life at the fullest, this punk-rock musician had shaken up Corsica in the 1980s, in the midst of nationalist political turmoil. Normal that his friends then nicknamed him "Speedo". Inspired agitator, Eric / Speedo was also the director's older brother. Together, in Ajaccio, the city of birth of Napoleon and with a whole generation, like that of millions of provincials, islanders and rural people scattered around the world, they took the punk wave in the face and this determined the rest of their lives.
title: Sale tête ce gamin
